data.lyric:
[ti:ay! (Explicit)]
[ar:Machine Gun Kelly/Lil Wayne]
[al:ay! (Explicit)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]ay! (Explicit) - Machine Gun Kelly (机关枪凯利)/Lil Wayne (李尔·韦恩)
[00:00.25]Lyrics by：Travis Barker/Colson Baker/Stephen Basil/Brandon Allen/Gregory Hein
[00:00.50]Composed by：Travis Barker/Colson Baker/Stephen Basil/Brandon Allen/Gregory Hein
[00:00.75]Machine Gun Kelly：
[00:00.76]I don't ever wanna fall when I'm this high
[00:03.61]
[00:04.17]I wrote a letter to myself
[00:06.86]In the form of a song I can play when the sun shines
[00:10.57]I know better than to trust
[00:13.41]Anything that I say to myself when I'm this high
[00:17.07]Ay ay ay ay
[00:20.35]I don't ever wanna fall when I'm this high
[00:23.64]Ay ay ay ay
[00:26.86]I don't ever wanna fall when I'm this high
[00:29.49]I just did a interview with my eyes closed
[00:32.26]Motherf**ker
[00:33.09]I just sparked a blunt it looked like pyro
[00:35.42]Pyro
[00:36.26]Only comments I see are the bad ones
[00:38.92]Yeah yeah
[00:39.52]Only playlists I like are the sad ones
[00:41.76]Yeah I let the medicine in
[00:43.27]I know it don't help in the end
[00:44.43]But I got depression again
[00:45.68]I had a meeting at 7
[00:46.95]I skipped it and slept in and woke up at 7 PM
[00:48.98]I cut my hair off like Britney
[00:50.63]Sprinkle dust like a Pixie
[00:52.21]Wiped my nose like it's itchy
[00:53.86]I'm tatted up I don't give a f**k yeah
[00:56.55]Ay ay ay ay
[00:59.53]I don't ever wanna fall when I'm this high
[01:02.81]Ay ay ay ay
[01:06.03]I don't ever wanna fall when I'm this high
[01:09.01]Lil Wayne：
[01:09.53]When I'm this high when I'm this high
[01:12.58]I just looked in the mirror who is this guy
[01:15.83]It's a full moon where the good shrooms
[01:19.10]I'm too f**king high sound like a good school
[01:22.20]Higher than Jehovah
[01:23.70]High with the heavens you know
[01:25.29]I'ma get pulled over
[01:26.91]I might need a chauffeur
[01:28.56]Lean in my soda so I'ma need a shoulder
[01:31.78]Why you got yo' nose up
[01:33.40]I smell like Guns N' Roses
[01:34.99]Machine Gun Kelly/Lil Wayne：
[01:35.76]Ay ay ay ay
[01:38.73]I don't ever wanna fall when I'm this high
[01:41.73]Tunechi
[01:42.19]Ay ay ay ay
[01:45.24]I don't ever wanna fall when I'm this high
[01:48.08]
[01:49.72]Machine Gun Kelly：
[01:50.71]
[01:58.29]I don't ever wanna fall when I'm this high
data.trans:
[ti:ay! (Explicit)]
[ar:Machine Gun Kelly/Lil Wayne]
[al:ay! (Explicit)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]腾讯音乐享有本翻译作品的著作权
[00:00.25]//
[00:00.50]//
[00:00.75]//
[00:00.76]我不想自己一落千丈 我这样高高在上
[00:03.61]
[00:04.17]我给自己写了封信
[00:06.86]以一首歌的形式 我可以在艳阳高照的日子播放
[00:10.57]我知道我不该轻信
[00:13.41]我这样高高在上 我对自己说的任何话我都不该轻信
[00:17.07]//
[00:20.35]我不想自己一落千丈 我这样高高在上
[00:23.64]//
[00:26.86]我不想自己一落千丈 我这样高高在上
[00:29.49]我闭着眼睛接受了采访
[00:32.26]//
[00:33.09]我刚刚点燃了一支烟 看起来就像火人
[00:35.42]火人
[00:36.26]我看见的评论都充满恶意
[00:38.92]//
[00:39.52]播放列表里我喜欢的歌曲都在歌唱悲情
[00:41.76]是 我吞下了药
[00:43.27]我知道最后它总会失效
[00:44.43]但我再次开始抑郁
[00:45.68]我在早上7点有个会议
[00:46.95]我翘掉了它 睡了个懒觉到晚上7点
[00:48.98]我像布兰妮一样剃光了我的头发
[00:50.63]像小精灵一样撒了点粉末
[00:52.21]我擦了擦鼻子 似乎鼻子很痒
[00:53.86]我身上纹满纹身 我不在乎
[00:56.55]//
[00:59.53]我不想自己一落千丈 我这样高高在上
[01:02.81]//
[01:06.03]我不想自己一落千丈 我这样高高在上
[01:09.01]//
[01:09.53]我这样高高在上 我这样高高在上
[01:12.58]我刚刚照了照镜子 这家伙是谁
[01:15.83]现在是满月 哪里有好吃的致幻蘑菇
[01:19.10]我嗨到不行 这听起来像一所好高中的大名
[01:22.20]嗨上了天 飞过耶和华的头顶
[01:23.70]嗨到了天堂上去 你知道
[01:25.29]我会被拦下
[01:26.91]我可能需要一个司机
[01:28.56]酒掺到苏打水里 所以我需要一个肩膀
[01:31.78]你为什么趾高气扬
[01:33.40]我身上散发出Guns N' Roses那种名人的味道
[01:34.99]//
[01:35.76]//
[01:38.73]我不想自己一落千丈 我这样高高在上
[01:41.73]Lil Wayne制作
[01:42.19]//
[01:45.24]我不想自己一落千丈 我这样高高在上
[01:48.08]

[01:58.29]我不想自己一落千丈 我这样高高在上
